text: allahuvekkutate avar viliccu prarthikkunnavaye ninnal sakarikkarut. annane ceytal avar tannalute arivillaymayal allahuveyum an'yayamayi sakarikkum. avvidham orea vibhagattinum avarute ceytikale nam ceteaharannalayi teannippiccirikkunnu. pinnit tannalute nathanre atuttekkan avarute matakkam. appeal, avar ceytukeantirunnatinepparriyellam avan avare vivaramariyikkum
